children.title: A.

children.content:

devices. Arrange so filter cartridges can be loaded from either access door.

children.title: D.
children.content:
Sealing: Incorporate positive-sealing gasket material on channels to seal top and bottom of filter
cartridge frames to prevent bypass of unfiltered air.

children.title: A.
children.content: Position each filter unit with clearance for normal service and maintenance. Anchor filter holding f...

children.title: B.
children.content: Install filters in position to prevent passage of unfiltered air.

children.title: C.
children.content: Install filter gage for each filter bank.

children.title: D.
children.content:
Do not operate fan system until particulate filters (temporary or permanent) are in place. Replace
temporary filters used during construction and testing with new, clean filters.

children.title: E.
children.content: Do not install gas-phase filters until fan system is clean and there is no risk of construction debr...

children.title: F.
children.content: Install filter-gage, static-pressure taps upstream and downstream from filters. Install filter gages...

children.title: G.
children.content:
Coordinate filter installations with duct and air-handling unit installations.

3.3

children.title: A.
children.content:
After completing system installation and testing, adjusting, and balancing air-handling and air-
distribution systems, clean filter housings and install new particulate filter media.
